item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I am known as MrArkon on the Internet. I am a Hobbyist Programmer from India who loves Python & Rust. I also Occasionally Design and Develop Websites. I am always eager to learn and experiment with new technologies. Technologies I use Web Technologies HTML & CSS SCSS Hugo TailWindCSS Software Developement Python Rust Databases PostGreSQL Redis SQLite MongoDB

item.title: Projects
item.description: A list of all of the projects I've worked on or I'm currently working on.
